country.query: SELECT ?city ?cityLabel ?country ?countryLabel ?image WHERE {    ?city wdt:P31 wd:Q515.    ?city wdt:P17 ?country.   OPTIONAL { ?city wdt:P18 ?image. } SERVICE wikibase:label {  bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "[AUTO_LANGUAGE]".   } }ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT ?limit

question.en: Which country does this image belong to?

famous_people.query: SELECT ?actor ?actorLabel ?image WHERE { ?actor wdt:P31 wd:Q5;  wdt:P106 wd:Q33999;  wdt:P27 wd:Q29.  OPTIONAL { ?actor wdt:P18 ?image. } SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "[AUTO_LANGUAGE]". }} LIMIT ?limit

flag.query: SELECT ?country ?countryLabel ?image WHERE { ?country wdt:P31 wd:Q6256; wdt:P41 ?image.  SERVICE wikibase:label { bd:serviceParam wikibase:language "[AUTO_LANGUAGE]". } }ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT ?limit
